thread.title: Houston's Simone Biles parties with celebs for 51 weekend
thread.title_full: Houston's Simone Biles parties with celebs for Super Bowl 51 weekend - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Houston's Simone Biles parties with celebs for 51 weekend
text:
Photo: Simone Biles/Twitter Image 1 of / 78 78 Simone Biles posed with several celebrities during Super Bowl 51 weekend, including Taylor Swift. >>Click to see other celebs spotted with the pint-size athlete, along with others seen around Houston during Super Bowl 51. less Simone Biles posed with several celebrities during Super Bowl 51 weekend, including Taylor Swift. >>Click to see other celebs spotted with the pint-size athlete, along with others seen around Houston during ... more Photo: Simone Biles/Twitter Image 2 of 78 Simone Biles at a Super Bowl 51 celebration in Houston. Here she's posing with Shaquille O'neal, who towers over the 4'9-tall Olympian.

Image 7 of 78 The Original Ninfa's on Navigation 2704 Navigation This Houston icon is frequented by actors, singers and anyone who knows good food. Michael Buble even gave them a shout-out onstage. The Original Ninfa's on Navigation 2704 Navigation This Houston icon is frequented by actors, singers and anyone who knows good food. Michael Buble even gave them a shout-out onstage. Photo: Gary Coronado, Houston Chronicle Image 8 of 78 You might catch someone on the newish Ninfa's patio bar. You might catch someone on the newish Ninfa's patio bar. Photo: Eric Hester Image 9 of 78 Four Seasons Hotel Houston 1300 Lamar The downtown location is perfect for celeb-watching. It's near the House of Blues, and many performers just walk across the street after a show. Four Seasons Hotel Houston 1300 Lamar The downtown location is perfect for celeb-watching. It's near the House of Blues, and many performers just walk across the street after a show. Photo: Four Seasons Hotels And Resorts Image 10 of 78 Grab a drink at the Vinoteca Quattro bar in the Four Seasons Hotel. Grab a drink at the Vinoteca Quattro bar in the Four Seasons Hotel. Photo: Houston Chronicle Image 11 of 78 Dirt Bar 1209 Caroline Forever known as the place Lady Gaga stopped for a drink. Dirt Bar 1209 Caroline Forever known as the place Lady Gaga stopped for a drink. Photo: Michael Paulsen Image 12 of 78 Pappasito's Cantina
2536 Richmond
Celebs, they're like us! And sometimes they want Tex-Mex. Beyoncé is known to visit this one when she's in town. Pappasito's Cantina
2536 Richmond
Celebs, they're like us! And sometimes they want Tex-Mex. Beyoncé is known to visit this one when she's in town. There's always a scene of some sort at Hotel Zaza. Photo: Michael Paulsen, Houston Chronicle Image 21 of 78 The Galleria 5085 Wesetheimer Shopping doesn't get grander than the Galleria, which is known to attract celebs on the regular. Photo: Karen Warren, Houston Chronicle Image 78 of 78 Houston's Simone Biles parties with celebs for Super Bowl 51 weekend 1 / 78 Back to Gallery Houston's beloved Olympic star Simone Biles is having a whirlwind time and offering up some of the best photos from Super Bowl 51 weekend.
Among the most adorable moments she shared ? A shot of herself, standing at 4'9" — donning heels, however — standing next to 7'1" Shaquille O'neal Sunday.
LIFESTYLE QUEEN: Martha Stewart brunched at Brennan's of Houston during Super Bowl 51 weekend
The gold medal winner has kept busy with celeb-packed parties for the better part of the week.
She was also spotted Saturday night posing with Taylor Swift, who performed that evening at the Super Bowl's wandering venue Club Nomadic. She and her Olympic teammate Aly Raisman also snapped a shot together with Grammy Award-winning star John Legend.
If you see any celebrities while you're out and about, submit your personal celebrity spotting into our interactive map above.
